output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. CMF Number: Present (CMF 11240017) - This indicates it's electoral propaganda 2. Candidate Reference: Yes, mentions "Marcel Ciolacu" who is a presidential candidate 3. Wide Population: Yes, it's a paid advertisement on Facebook/Instagram reaching 5000-6000 impressions 4. Electoral Objective: Yes, it promotes campaign activities and Ciolacu's governance program 5. Journalism: No, this is clearly campaign material 6. Personal Opinion: No, this is an organized campaign message
Key elements: - Mentions campaign day ("ziua de campanie") - Promotes governance program ("programului de guvernare") - References presidential candidate Marcel Ciolacu - Uses campaign hashtag (#caleasigurapentrubihor) - Has CMF number - Paid distribution - Mentions "propunerilor pre»ôedintelui Marcel Ciolacu" which directly ties to presidential campaign

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This post clearly constitutes electoral propaganda because: - It explicitly mentions campaign activities - References a presidential candidate's program - Uses campaign messaging and hashtags - Contains CMF number - Is paid advertising reaching a wide audience - Promotes the candidate's proposals
conclusion.message-for-police: Infomed Pro SRL, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin difuzarea de materiale de propaganda electorala pentru candidatul prezidential Marcel Ciolacu dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie electorala. Postarea cu ID 540099652150122 promoveaza in mod activ programul de guvernare si propunerile lui Marcel Ciolacu ca presedinte, folosind hashtag-ul de campanie #caleasigurapentrubihor si continand numarul CMF 11240017, specific materialelor de campanie electorala. Efectul electoral al postarii este evident prin promovarea directa a candidatului si a programului sau prezidential, mesajul fiind difuzat ca reclama platita pe Facebook si Instagram dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, atingand intre 5000-6000 de utilizatori.
